author: anon.
contents: prose text of uncertain nature, mentioning Rhadamanthys and Athena (?).
statepreservation: underneath large traces (from a drawing?) taking up 6.5 cm, remains of three incomplete lines, broken off on both sides; below the text to the right are again large traces (from a drawing?) occupying ca. 5 cm.
hand: fair-sized to large, informal, round, upright, generally bilinear, somewhat irregular in size and spacing, not keeping the lines straight, written with a thick pen by a slow though not unpractised hand, well separating the letters, without decorations.
